summary: A set of weapons inspired by Red Alert
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29196-5-1356969321.jpg[/img]

[size=5]:: Description ::[/size]
[size=4]This mod adds a set of weapons inspired by Red Alert into Skyrim. The weapons are completely craftable under the Iron category. The shields are completely craftable under the Imperial category.They are also enchantable and upgradable. [/size]

[size=5]:: Installation ::[/size]
[size=4]To Install this mod: 
NMM- Fairly straight-forward. Simply follow the standard installation instructions for installing a mod with Nexus Mod Manager.
Manual-Unpack the .7z into your Skyrim/ directory.
To Uninstall just delete the files pertinent to this mod.[/size]

[size=5]::Change Log::[/size]
[size=4]1.0 
- Initial Release[/size]

[size=5]::Credits ::[/size]
[size=4]The models using in this mod was created by RAIS from ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM, China.
The rest work was completed by Aronchack.
Thanks to tinybeast for translating this mod. 
ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM™ is an unofficial organization which devotes to making Skyrim mods.
Please email me: [url=mailto:aron.chack@gmail.com]aron.chack@gmail.com[/url] if you encounter any problems.
Our site:[url=http://www.ankteam.com/]http://www.ankteam.com/[/url]
[/size]

[size=5]::Permissions::[/size]
[size=4]Please feel free for use of my work in another mod, as long as you credit me and ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM™ and add a link to the this mod. [/size]
author: Arrow and Knee MOD Team
